question: Navin Patnaik has been re-elected as a Chief Minister of Odisha for how many times (Till now)?
explanation: Navin Patnaik has been re-elected as a Chief Minister for five consecutive terms. His recent tenure is 2019 to present. He is currently at rank 6 in the list of longest-serving Chief MInisters of India. Pawan Kumar Chamling (24 years 165 days) is at no 1 on the list.
